elements.title: Mai Murakami (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Mai Murakami (pictured) was the first Japanese female gymnast in 63 years to win a world title?

elements.title: Super Robin Hood (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Maid Marian in Super Robin Hood was voiced by the developers' mother?

elements.title: Charles Throsby Smith (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Charles Throsby Smith led the first British expedition to what became Canberra, and is a founding figure of Wollongong?

elements.title: Tokyo Opera City Concert Hall (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a 1:10 wooden model was used in the acoustic design of Tokyo Opera City Concert Hall?

elements.title: Jakobus Onnen (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that historian Jürgen Matthäus used artificial intelligence to help identify Jakobus Onnen as the gunman in The Last Jew in Vinnitsa?

elements.title: morally condemn (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that people routinely morally condemn taboo acts like consensual incest, even though they cannot explain why?

elements.title: fireworks in New Zealand (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a petition to restrict the sale of fireworks in New Zealand included 80,000 paw prints?

elements.title: Adonis Carrasco (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that FIFA-listed referee Adonis Carrasco signed up for basic training without having ever played football and without knowing any rules?

elements.title: Tipat Halav (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Tipat Halav, a network of well-baby care centers, cut infant mortality rates in pre-state Israel by more than 50 percent between 1927 and 1948?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

El Cuyo

El Cuyo beckons to visitors looking for a quiet, natural seaside town to bask in the sun undisturbed by revelers while other visitors seek adrenaline-pumping excitement.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

Dehydration

A condition that may affect travellers in many places and for many reasons. Never pleasant, sometimes fatal.
